price: او زموږ په شان يو انسان پرته بل څه نه يې او بې شكه موږ په تا ګومان كوو چې له درواغجنو يې.
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wamā anta illā basharun mith'lunā wa-in naẓunnuka lamina al-kādhibīna
